item.title: February 2023 Update
item.description: February started with a bang and ended with a whimper. All of January's forward progress carried over to the new month with several objects being modelled and machined. I refined the pickup cover design a bit and also moved into the recessed pickup rings. From there I made some good progress on a two-piece knob design. Here's a short video showing how quick you're able to take an idea from paper to a physical object with all these awesome modern tools.
